TheWolf: ^"Is that... Little Red Riding Hood?  In these woods again?  I thought you knew better than to come around here!"
^"I should have known I'd find your mangy hide here, Wolf!"
^"What do you think you're doing here?!"

c-1: ^"I don't have to tell you anything.  Why so hostile?"
g-0: ^"You've been gone from these woods for too long, Red!  You don't know how things work around here anymore!"
^"I know enough! You always had it in for Grandmother!"

c-0: ^"So what if I did?  What, did someone finally whack the old broad?"
^"How dare you!  I'll kill you for that!"
^"You can try, Red!  Show me what you got!"
^"Whoa!  It's Little Red Riding Hood!  You're back?"
^"Who's playin'?  It's been a long time, Red, surely you're not still mad?"
^"Whoa, what?  Just because of a little honey?  It's not like I killed anyone.  Uh.  Recently, that is."
^"...Whoa.  The old bag finally kicked it?  Hah!  I thought the forest was busier lately!  I bet one of those humans got her!"
^"If you didn't, then WHO?  TALK, Bear!"
^"Huh, well, smart money is on the Hunter, if you ask me.  He's been killing all over the forest."
^"Then there's the Axman, but he just hates trees.  And there's that weird Hiker wandering around, and that chatty Hippie."
^"And you remember the Wizard.  He and Grandmother had a big fight a while back, really tore up the forest."
^"The Hunter, the Axman, the Hiker, the Hippie, and the Wizard.
^"Yeah, bunch of weirdo humans.  Bet you anything it was one of them that did it."
^"Why are you telling me so easily?"
^"Well, it's not like you're going to get away from me AGAIN, is it?  Not too often a free meal comes to me!"

TheHiker: ^"My, at least it's a lovely day!"

g-0: ^"Who are you?!  What are you doing in the forest?!"
g-1: ^"What?  Me?  Well, I went out looking for my Cat, but it's such a nice day out, I decided to go for a walk.  Have you seen The Cat anywhere?"
g-2: ^"Yes, he's a housecat and he got lost recently.  I've looked all over the forest for him!  I even talked to this old woman, and she... Well.  Let's just say that encounter didn't go very well!"
^"Do you mean Grandmother?  What did you do to her?!"
g-3: ^"Hey now, I don't like that tone!  Look, if you're not going to help me find my Cat, then maybe just leave me alone!"

TheHippie: ^"What?  What's that red smudge I see... Oh hey!  Is that Little Red?"

g-0: ^"No kidding!  Wow, you've... Actually, you look exactly like I remember, now that I think about it."
^"Glad to see you're well.  Did you hear about Grandmother?"
g-1: ^"I did, man.  That's a real bummer.  I'm sorry for your loss, Red, even Grandmother didn't deserve to go out like that."
^"I'm searching for who did it.  Would you have any leads?"

c-3: ^"How did you know she was dead?  Who told you?"

c-0: ^"Huh... That's a good point!  Who did tell me!  Oh brother!  They said the guy did it with a weapon, too!  Crazy!"
^"Try to rememeber!  It had to have been recently!"
^"Oh!  Uh, then it had to be one of my friends!  They're around here if you go searching for them."

^"My friend The Fish is over by the lake, he sees all kinds of stuff.  And The Owl is off roosting in his tree, but you know how he is.  And there's this crazy Cat around.  If you ask anyone, ask him!"
^"The Fish, The Owl, and The Cat.  Ok.  Thank you."
^"It's all our forest, man, we gotta stick together.  Stay safe out there, Red!  Lotta weirdos around the forest these days!"

g-2: ^"Oh man.  I wish I could help, but I've just been here, doing my thing.  Maybe you can ask my friends?"
g-3: ^"My friend The Fish is over by the lake, he sees all kinds of stuff.  And The Owl is off roosting in his tree, but you know how he is.  And there's this crazy Cat around.  If you ask anyone, ask him!"
^"The Fish, The Owl, and The Cat.  Ok.  Thank you."
g-4: ^"It's all our forest, man, we gotta stick together.  Stay safe out there, Red!  Lotta weirdos around the forest these days!"

TheAxman: ^"Dum dee dum dee dum, swinging my ax, chopping the wood, dum dee dum dee dum...!  ...Oh? Can I help you with something?"
^"Maybe.  I'm investigating a murder in these woods."

g-0: ^"A murder?  Oh my goodness!  How terrible!  Do you have any leads?"
^"I'm working the case.  Have you see or heard anything?"
g-1: ^"Oh no, of course not!  All I ever see are these trees that need to be chopped down!  There are houses that need heating!"
^"Understandable.  If I have further questions, I'll come back."
g-2: ^"I'm sure this is where I'll be.  These are my woods, after all!  Hohoho...!"

enough_clues_found: ^"You.  It was YOU, wasn't it?!  TELL ME!"

g-0: ^"...You already know, don't you?  I can tell."
^"I know enough.  Why?!  Why did you do it?!"
g-2: ^"You... stupid girl!  You think this is a GAME?!  You think this forest is all for FUN?!  You and your Grandmother!  Always getting in the way!  Telling us what we can and can't do!"
g-3: ^"Well, these aren't YOUR trees, Red!  Thes are MY TREES, RED!  And I told that to Grandmother!  And now!  I'm going to tell you too!"

TheWizard: ^"Well, well.  Little Red Riding Hood.  You've come a long way to see me."

g-0: ^"No time to catch up, eh?  You've been gone from the forest for years."
g-1: ^"I don't see what business it is of yours, Red.  You left the forest."]
^"It's my business since Grandmother was murdered."
g-2: ^"Like you don't know?  You have a crystal ball!"
g-3: ^"This... That's not...  Red, I think you should go.  I... I would rather be alone right now."
^"Fine.  But at least tell me what you know."
^"Fat chance.  Tell me what happened.  Right now."

c-4: ^"I will tell you nothing with that tone, Red.  I have no reason to help you now."
^"You think I'm just going to leave?"

c-0: ^"I will not help you, Red.  Leave me be."
^"...Fine.  But if I find out you had something to do with it, I'm coming back!"

g-4: ^"I cannot tell you what I do not know, Red.  This... is the first I am hearing of this."
g-5: ^"...Leave me be, Red.  This is not your forest anymore."]
g-6: ^"I'm not asking, Red.  Leave.  Or I will make you."
^"You think you have what it takes, old man?  Let's go!"

TheCat: ^"...Where did that Owl go... It was just there..."
^"Hey, Cat!  What are you doing here?"

g-0: ^"Ugh, ANOTHER human.  What do YOU want?"
^"There's been a murder in this forest."
g-2: ^"Whoa, hold up there, Human!  What I know isn't free.  What are you going to give me, if you want my help?"
^"How about I give you a knuckle sandwich?"

c-4: ^The offended Cat turns away and refuses to speak further.

g-3: ^"Well, since you're being so generous and offering, why don't you get me something to eat?  There was a juicy Fish right around here, and I'm partial to a bit of Owl, too!"

food_delivered: ^"Ooh, you brought the good stuff!  Give it here!"

g-0: ^"Mm, oh yeah, that's the stuff.  So do you want to like, scratch my back or something?"
^"I want to know who murdered Grandmother."
g-1: ^"Oh, right.  That.  The old woman who got the chop."
g-2: ^"Fine, fine, but only because that was such a tasty treat.  It was another human, an ugly male with a red bandana, carrying an axe."
g-3: ^"Sure, whatever.  He was pretty happy afterwards, humming and singing to himself when he walked off into the forest.
g-4: ^"Alrighty, you do that then.  I'm gonna stay here, in front of this fire..."

TheFish: ^"Boy, this water is great!  I sure do love being alive!"

g-0: ^"Hello, Human!  You're not going to kill me, are you?"

c-2: ^"You should have thought of that before being born a fish."

g-1: ^"Well, the last human with a stick I saw was all covered in blood, and I think they probably just killed someone.  So I got worried when I saw you!"
^"You saw a human with a stick, covered in blood?"
g-2: ^"I saw a human with a brown thing, pointy thing in their hands!  Probably a human...  Are you going to kill me?"
g-3: ^"Well, that doesn't make me feel very good!"

TheOwl: ^"Oh my stars above!  If it isn't Little Red Riding Hood!  WhatEVER brings you beneath my tree of our glorious forest once more?"

c-1: ^"Oh my lands afar!  Well, I would just be tickled pink to help you out!  Whatever can I do?"
^"Owl, someone killed Grandmother.  Have you seen anyone suspicious?"

c-0: ^"KILLED Grandmother, you say?  Oh my poor heart, suddenly so stricken!  WHOever could have done such a thing?"]
^"I know many things, Little Red!  I am a wise and knowledgeable old owl after all!  All the secrets of the forest are mine!"
c-1: ^"Talking?  What of, Little Red?  There are so many topics to choose from!"
^"Wha- About Grandmother!  Tell me who killed her!"

c-0: ^"Oh my words that flow from mine own tongue!  Perhaps your search for who killed her is but a search for the death of your own soul?"
^"Upon this path of vengeance, would you truly slay the innocent?  How horrible!  What incentive have I to speak my mind now?"
^"I'm going to turn you into cat food, Owl.  Hold still!"

g-0: ^"We are all but spirited children of our mother forest, aren't we, Red?  You know I do so love to use the glorious gift of gab!"
^"I am aware.  Someone killed Grandmother, Owl."

c-0: ^"Oh my words that flow from mine own tongue!  Perhaps your search for who killed her is but a search for the death of your own soul?"
^"My friend and dearest ally, Little Red Riding Hood, most fearsome of all the predators of the forest!  Whatever do you meant?"
^"Do you know anything or not, Owl?"
^"You underestimate me dear Red!  I know so many, many things!  How could I ever reply to such a question so easily as the sands of time flow?"
^"I swear to God, Owl, if you know something..."
^"You speak to a genius, dear Red!  Of COURSE I know things!  It is YOU who is not being specific!"
^"Not being... You know what, never mind."

TheHunter: ^"AGH, I just HATE animals!  WHY are they still ALIVE?!"

g-0: ^"Oh great, look who it is!  Everyone's favorite treehugger, Little Red Riding Hood!"
^"What are you doing in these woods?"

c-2: ^"What does it matter to YOU?  These forests are open to everyone that knows how to jump!"
^"It matters a lot!  There's blood everywhere!"

c-0: ^"What are you some kind of detective now, as well as the big big forest girl?"

g-1: ^"What does it LOOK like?  These ANIMALS are just running around EVERYWHERE!  Being ALIVE!  Someone has to stop them!"
^"That's... insane.  Do you need help of some kind?"
g-2: ^"SCREW YOU, Red!  I don't need help from you!  I didn't need help from Grandmother neither!"
g-3: ^"You and her can both jump off a cliff, that's what I know!  That old biddy, putting up "No Hunting" signs all over the forest!  Whose side does she think she's on?"
g-4: ^"Not like the Wizard or that worthless Hippie can save us from the animals!  If all of you lazy tree-huggers weren't in the way, then I could finally kill ALL the animals!"
^"Obviously I'm not going to let you do that!"

c-7: ^"What are you going to do to stop me?  I don't hunt humans, just like I told the Axman!"

c-0: ^"No!  I ain't saying another word!  Why don't you buzz off already, like a fly off these corpses!"
